ValidationRule.description: If the status is "Purchased ERP" the stage can not be changed to any previous stage.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Purchased ERP') , OR(ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Draft'),ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Quoted'),ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Pending Payment'),ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Requested Cancellation'),ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Active'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'In Active') ,ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Non Renewed')) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This ERP has already been purchased.
